attributes.action: Life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness equality Fairness And Equal Rights For Us Uk Nationals In The Uk Visa Process
attributes.additional_details:
The Uk Visa  In It.s Present -State And Capacity Is Not On Equal Fairness  And Equality To All Of Us Uk Nationals  And Its Needs Changing  Not Decrimination in the 21st Century As Decrimination In Any Democracy Or Society is totally unacceptable so We Need Real Real Rights As Citizens Of This Country For,
Equal Rights And Fairness To Us Uk Nationals
For Those On Low Incomes  And Those Out Of Work
To Apply For Uk Visa.s  Its Time To Change This Law Of Outright Decrimination  in The Present uk Visa System Right  The Wronged
Make Fairness And Equality To Us All
And Kick Out Decrimination In Any Democracy Or Society Out Right
Give Us Our Rights
And Not Hold Us In Bondage  In Shackles
We Have Rights Too
As Gods People
As We Have Get one life  In This Life
And Thats Not To Be Held As Slaves By The State
And Have Our Lifes Destroyed  By Denie Us Our Rights Too As Citizens Of This Country
